00018 HierarchyModel::HierarchyModel(LibraryData* sourceModel, 
00019                                                            LibraryInterface* handler,
00020                                                            QObject *parent):
00021 QAbstractItemModel(parent),
00022 dataModel_(sourceModel),
00023 rootItem_(),
00024 handler_(handler) {
00025 
00026         // connect the signals that are needed to print messages
00027         LibraryHandler* handler2 = static_cast<LibraryHandler*>(handler);
00028         connect(this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00029                 handler2, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00030         connect(this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00031                 handler2, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00032 
00033         onResetModel();
00034 }

00037 }

00039 void HierarchyModel::onResetModel() {
00040         
00041         beginResetModel();
00042 
00043         // create the root item if it does not yet exist
00044         if (!rootItem_) {
00045                 rootItem_ = QSharedPointer<HierarchyItem>(new HierarchyItem(handler_, this));
00046                 connect(rootItem_.data(), SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00047                         this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00048                 connect(rootItem_.data(), SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00049                         this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00050         }
00051         // if root exists then tell it to remove children
00052         else
00053                 rootItem_->clear();
00054         
00055         // get the items to be displayed from the data source
00056         QList<VLNV*> items = dataModel_->getItems();
00057 
00058         QList<VLNV*> absDefs;
00059 
00060         // add all items to this model
00061         for (int i = 0; i < items.size(); ++i) {
00062 
00063                 // make sure the item can be parsed
00064                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(*items.at(i));
00065                 if (!libComp)
00066                         continue;
00067 
00068                 // if item is component or bus definition
00069                 if (items.at(i) && (handler_->getDocumentType(*items.at(i)) == VLNV::COMPONENT ||
00070                         handler_->getDocumentType(*items.at(i)) == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION)) {
00071                         
00072                         rootItem_->createChild(items.at(i));
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 // if item is abstraction definition append the abstraction definition to the list
00076                 else if (handler_->getDocumentType(*items.at(i)) == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION) {
00077                         absDefs.append(items.at(i));
00078                         rootItem_->createChild(items.at(i));
00079                 }
00080         }
00081 
00082         // create the abstraction definitions
00083         for (int i = 0; i < absDefs.size(); ++i) {
00084                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(*absDefs.at(i));
00085                 QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef = libComp.staticCast<AbstractionDefinition>();
00086 
00087                 VLNV busDefVlnv = absDef->getBusType();
00088 
00089                 QList<HierarchyItem*> busDefItems = rootItem_->findItems(busDefVlnv);
00090                 for (int j = 0; j < busDefItems.size(); ++j) {
00091                         busDefItems.at(j)->createChild(absDefs.at(i));
00092                 }
00093         }
00094 
00095         // remove the duplicates
00096         rootItem_->cleanUp();
00097 
00098         endResetModel();
00099 }

00101 QVariant HierarchyModel::headerData(int section, 
00102                                                                         Qt::Orientation orientation, 
00103                                                                         int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00104         // only one column in tree view
00105         if (section != 0) {
00106                 return QVariant();
00107         }
00108         // only horizontal headers
00109         else if (orientation != Qt::Horizontal) {
00110                 return QVariant();
00111         }
00112         // for displayRole
00113         else if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00114                 return tr("Library components");
00115         }
00116         // not supported role
00117         else {
00118                 return QVariant();
00119         }
00120 }

00122 int HierarchyModel::columnCount(const QModelIndex&) const {
00123         return 1;
00124 }

00126 int HierarchyModel::rowCount(const QModelIndex& parent /*= QModelIndex()*/ ) const {
00127         // only one column exists
00128         if (parent.column() > 0) {
00129                 return 0;
00130         }
00131 
00132         HierarchyItem* parentItem = 0;
00133 
00134         // if the given item is invalid then it is the root
00135         if (!parent.isValid())
00136                 parentItem = rootItem_.data();
00137         else
00138                 parentItem = static_cast<HierarchyItem*>(parent.internalPointer());
00139 
00140         return parentItem->getNumberOfChildren();
00141 }

00143 QModelIndex HierarchyModel::index(int row, 
00144                                                                   int column,
00145                                                                   const QModelIndex &parent /*= QModelIndex()*/ ) const {
00146         if (!hasIndex(row, column, parent))
00147                 return QModelIndex();
00148 
00149         HierarchyItem* parentItem = 0;
00150 
00151         // if the index of the parent is invalid then it is the root
00152         if (!parent.isValid())
00153                 parentItem = rootItem_.data();
00154         else
00155                 parentItem = static_cast<HierarchyItem*>(parent.internalPointer());
00156 
00157         HierarchyItem* child = parentItem->child(row);
00158 
00159         // if child is found
00160         if (child) {
00161                 return createIndex(row, column, child);
00162         }
00163         else
00164                 return QModelIndex();
00165 }
00166 
00167 QModelIndex HierarchyModel::index(HierarchyItem* item) const {
00168         if (!item)
00169                 return QModelIndex();
00170 
00171         // if this item has no parent then it is the root item
00172         HierarchyItem* parent = item->parent();
00173         if (!parent)
00174                 return QModelIndex();
00175 
00176         // create the index for the child
00177         return createIndex(item->row(), 0, item);
00178 }

00180 QModelIndexList HierarchyModel::findIndexes( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00181         QList<HierarchyItem*> items = rootItem_->findItems(vlnv);
00182 
00183         QModelIndexList list;
00184 
00185         // get model index of each hierarchy item
00186         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, items) {
00187                 list.append(index(item));
00188         }
00189         return list;
00190 }
00191 
00192 QModelIndex HierarchyModel::parent(const QModelIndex& child) const {
00193         if (!child.isValid())
00194                 return QModelIndex();
00195 
00196         // pointer to the child item
00197         HierarchyItem* childItem = static_cast<HierarchyItem*>(child.internalPointer());
00198         HierarchyItem* parent = childItem->parent();
00199 
00200         // if the parent does not exist then this item is root item
00201         if (!parent)
00202                 return QModelIndex();
00203 
00204         // if row is invalid then the grandparent does not exist and the parent is
00205         // a root item so we return an invalid QModelIndex
00206         int row = parent->row();
00207         if (row == -1) {
00208                 return QModelIndex();
00209         }
00210 
00211         // create new index and return it
00212         return createIndex(row, 0, parent);
00213 }

00215 QVariant HierarchyModel::data(const QModelIndex& index, 
00216                                                           int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole*/ ) const {
00217         if (!index.isValid())
00218                 return QVariant();
00219 
00220         HierarchyItem* item = static_cast<HierarchyItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00221 
00222         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00223                 VLNV vlnv = item->getVLNV();
00224                 if (vlnv.isValid()) {
00225                         return QString("\n%1:%2\n"
00226                                 "%3:%4").arg(
00227                                 vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00228                                 vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00229                                 vlnv.getName()).arg(
00230                                 vlnv.getVersion());
00231                 }
00232 
00233                 // root item has no vlnv and no data to display
00234                 else
00235                         return QVariant();
00236         }
00237         else if (role == Qt::ForegroundRole) {
00238                 
00239                 // valid items are displayed in black color
00240                 if (item->isValid()) 
00241                         return QColor("black");
00242 
00243                 // invalid items are displayed in red color
00244                 else
00245                         return QColor("red");
00246         }
00247         else if (role == Qt::ToolTipRole) {
00248                 return QString("File path: %1").arg(dataModel_->getPath(item->getVLNV()));
00249         }
00250         else if (role == Qt::DecorationRole) {
00251                 // if item is component
00252                 if (item->type() == HierarchyItem::COMPONENT) {
00253                         
00254                         switch (item->getImplementation()) {
00255                                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SYS: {
00256                                         return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/new-system.png");
00257                                                                                            }
00258                                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW: {
00259                                         KactusAttribute::SWType swType = item->getSoftwareType();
00260 
00261                                         if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION)
00262                                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/new-sw_component.png");
00263                                         else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM) 
00264                                                 return QIcon(":icons/graphics/API.png");
00265                                         else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS)
00266                                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/endpoints.png");
00267                                         else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_MAPPING) 
00268                                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/new-sw_design.png");
00269                                                                                           }
00270                                 default: {
00271                                         if (item->isHierarchical()) {
00272                                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/hierarchy.png");
00273                                         }
00274                                         else
00275                                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/component.png");
00276                                                  }
00277                         }
00278                         
00279                 }
00280                 // if item is bus
00281                 else 
00282                         return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/new-bus.png");
00283         }
00284 
00285         // unsupported role
00286         else
00287                 return QVariant();
00288 }

00290 bool HierarchyModel::hasChildren(const QModelIndex& parent /*= QModelIndex()*/ ) const {
00291         
00292         // only one column exists
00293         if (parent.column() > 0)
00294                 return false;
00295 
00296         HierarchyItem* parentItem = 0;
00297 
00298         // if given item is invalid then it is root item
00299         if (!parent.isValid())
00300                 parentItem = rootItem_.data();
00301         else
00302                 parentItem = static_cast<HierarchyItem*>(parent.internalPointer());
00303 
00304         // ask parent if it has children
00305         return parentItem->hasChildren();
00306 }

00308 Qt::ItemFlags HierarchyModel::flags(const QModelIndex& index) const {
00309         if (!index.isValid())
00310                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00311         return Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable;
00312 }

00314 void HierarchyModel::onOpenDesign( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00315         if (!index.isValid())
00316                 return;
00317 
00318         HierarchyItem* item = static_cast<HierarchyItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00319         VLNV vlnv = item->getVLNV();
00320 
00321         if (vlnv.isValid())
00322                 emit openDesign(vlnv);
00323 }

00385 void HierarchyModel::onExportItem( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00386         if (!index.isValid())
00387                 return;

00397 void HierarchyModel::onRemoveVLNV( VLNV* vlnv ) {
00398         if (!vlnv)
00399                 return;
00400         else if (!vlnv->isValid())
00401                 return;
00402 
00403         beginResetModel();
00404         rootItem_->removeItems(*vlnv);
00405         endResetModel();
00406 }

00412 void HierarchyModel::onComponentSaved( const VLNV&) {
